description: Number of elements required for synthesis of rational function of degree n by "half-n" Miyata method.
references: E. A. Guilleman, Synthesis of Passive Networks, Wiley, 1957, p. 410.
S. N. Hunt, An Evaluation of Miyata's Driving-Point Impedance Synthesis Procedure, S. M. Thesis, MIT, Jun, 1955.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 11 2001
